p: For those who rely on subsistence fishing, such as Aboriginal populations, health can be affected when drought affects the health of aquatic organisms [ 46]. Drought can increase the likelihood of disease spread and/or exposure to an accumulation of contaminants in the water for these aquatic organisms [ 46]. They can also be impacted by decreases in the quality and quantity of water during drought or through contamination introduced by the rains that follow drought [ 52].
